name: My inner voice
description:
This is my submission to the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

The theme was "You are not alone", and I wanted to make a game about depression and anxiety.

In this game, you have to build a deck with cards that either describe an activity you can do, or an inspirational phrase to cheer you up. Then, in the battle phase, you have to choose your cards wisely in order to fight your feelings.

Enjoy !
